item.title: Introduction
item.description: Get started The first step is to install the Githaxs application. Navigate to the GitHub application page for Githaxs or Githaxs Workflow. Click on Install or Configure. Select the GitHub Organization you want to install the application on. Select either All repositories or Only select repositories; if the latter select which repositories you wish to install the application on. Note both Githaxs applications are configured from a repository named githaxs_settings within your organization.

item.title: Migration
item.description: How do I Migrate? Migrating to Githaxs is a lot easier than migrating between other CI/CD providers. When migrating to Githaxs there is no need to translate between Jenkins and CircleCI syntax. Here is the three step process: Install Githaxs Application. Create githaxs_settings/ghx.yml configuration file. Delete CI tasks from your current CI tooling (optional)
